items.title: Ministers welcome PM's New Year message, pledge to focus on reform, people's welfare
items.summary: KUALA LUMPUR: Members of the Cabinet have welcomed the 2026 New Year Message delivered by Prime Minister Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim on Monday (Jan 5), affirming their full commitment to implementing the reform agenda within their respective ministries to accelerate national development and ensure the welfare of the people. Read full story

Either way, if you’re still looking to secure the latest Apple Watch Series 11 to help motivate your 2026 workouts, we wanted to highlight the $100 price drops you can still take advantage of – several models are now completely out of stock or back at full price, so you’ll want to get in there while you can.

items.title: Anker’s 2026 New Year sale now live: Up to 55% off Prime and Nano chargers, bundle offers, more
items.summary:
In addition to launching a new 45W display-equipped iPhone charger, Anker is ringing in the new year with major savings across its most popular gear. Everything from Prime charging stations and Nano chargers to MagSafe stands, cables, and more is discounted right now as part of its 2026 New Year sale. In addition to straightforward price cuts that are also matched at the brand’s Amazon storefront, Anker is sweetening the deal with additional savings with stacked discounts when your cart value is $99 or more. Now’s the time to jump in if you’re looking to upgrade your charging setup for the new year, so be sure to snag the limited-time New Year deals before they disappear.

What we love

items.title: Anker debuts tiny new 45W iPhone Nano charger with Smart Display, 180-degree foldable prong, more [Launch deal]
items.summary:
Anker is kicking off 2026 with a brand-new charger that builds upon its existing 45W model with some notable new features. The new 2026 45W Nano charger sports a built-in “Smart Display” which, according to the brand, “recognizes your iPhone and adjusts charging for better battery longevity.” You can get it in Aurora White, Black Stone, Misty Blue, and Orange finishes, and they’re all available now with a nice $10 launch deal down at $29.99 shipped. Head below for a closer look and more details.
